channel.title: [guide] Says Priest is present in every game
channel.description:
#### What happened? Setup section says Priest is present in every game
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It's only King and Prince, right?
#### Steps to reproduce: Press the in game "guide" button
#### Comments: Just bought the game for my wife and myself. Wee! Thanks for supporting Linux

item.title: [guide] Says Priest is present in every game
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Outdated setup section.

I think they will fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: [guide] Says Priest is present in every game

item.title: [guide] Says Priest is present in every game

item.description:
What happened?

Setup section says Priest is present in every game

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It’s only King and Prince, right?

Steps to reproduce:

Press the in game “guide” button

Comments:

Just bought the game for my wife and myself. Wee! Thanks for supporting Linux
